name: Cogzidel Consultancy Services
tag_list: management-consulting, cogzidel, business-consulting, payroll-processing, accounting-services, hr-services
overview:
Cogzidel Consultancy Services is a Business Process Consulting & Management company, which offers end-to-end services like Accounting, Statutory Compliances, Human Resource, Fund Raising and more.

At Cogzidel, we strive to improve the competitive advantage of our clients by managing their business processes and cutting their cosy by leveraging on professional expertise, best of breed practices and a strong bias toward perfection.

We specialize in serving start ups, small businesses, mid market enterprises and big corporations. We are successful in delivering the needs of the clients in this rapidly growing & changing market by following;

  • an entrepreneurial client engagement model, emphasizing on value creation from day one.
  • a flexible service delivery model to deal with high growth in a structured environment.
